Title: Girls' Night
Writer: Michael Short, Eugene Levy (created by), Dan Levy (created by), Rebecca Kohler (executive story editor), Monica Heisey (story editor), Michael Balazo (story editor)
Actors: Eugene Levy, Catherine O'Hara, Dan Levy, Annie Murphy
Plot: In talking about Ted in front of Alexis and how romantic he seemed out with his girlfriend Heather, Moira learns just how little she knows of what is truly going on in Alexis' life. ...
